item.title: [neo] A-Akki Ronin
item.description:
Creature — Goblin Samurai

Whenever a Samurai or Warrior you control attacks alone, you may put a card from your hand on the bottom of your library. If you do, draw a card.

item.title: [neo] A-Imperial Subduer
item.description:
Creature — Human Samurai

Whenever a Samurai or Warrior you control attacks alone, tap target creature you don't control.

item.title: [neo] A-Eiganjo Exemplar
item.description:
Enchantment Creature — Human Samurai

Whenever a Samurai or Warrior you control attacks alone, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

item.title: [neo] A-Peerless Samurai
item.description:
Creature — Human Samurai

Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

Whenever a Samurai or Warrior you control attacks alone, the next spell you cast this turn costs {1} less to cast.

item.title: [neo] A-Raiyuu, Storm's Edge
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Samurai

First strike

Whenever a Samurai or Warrior you control attacks alone, untap it. If it's the first combat phase of the turn, there is an additional combat phase after this phase.

item.title: [40k] Tyranid Prime
item.description:
Creature — Tyranid

Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

Synapse Creature — Other creatures you control have evolve.

item.title: [40k] Tzaangor Shaman
item.description:
Creature — Mutant Shaman

Flying

Sorcerous Elixir — Whenever Tzaangor Shaman deals combat damage to a player, copy the next instant or sorcery spell you cast this turn when you cast it. You may choose new targets for the copy.

item.title: [40k] Zoanthrope
item.description:
Creature — Tyranid

Ravenous (This creature enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. If X is 5 or more, draw a card when it enters.)

Flying, ward {2}

Warp Blast — When Zoanthrope enters the battlefield, it deals X damage to any target.

item.title: [40k] Canoptek Scarab Swarm
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Insect

Flying

Feeder Mandibles — When Canoptek Scarab Swarm enters the battlefield, exile target player's graveyard. For each artifact or land card exiled this way, create a 1/1 colorless Insect artifact creature token with flying.
